Name: 華触の典
About the game: Are you Seedbed or Bride ? Tentacle BL ✕ training simulation After being toyed with by mysterious tentacles, the main character ends up in a nursery or a bride. Story At the urging of his friend, the main character, Itsuki Kashima, is sent to clean up his friend's relative's house deep in the mountains. On the way, he gets lost and wanders into an old shrine, where he encounters something hideous inside the main shrine and is attacked. Trapped by the tentacles, Itsuki gradually drowns in the pleasures of the tentacles. Character Kashima Itsuki (CV. Samatarou) Protagonist, receptionist, college student. he has a foul mouth He tends to take things easy. System The player becomes a tentacle point of view and chooses what kind of action to take against the main character. Performing taming consumes the hero's health. Resting the hero restores his health. When I run out of stamina... Trample, insult, and subdue the hero's body at will. Basic specifications ・40 base CGs (including 37 H scenes), over 280 including variations ・3 endings ・Scene recollection ・CG viewing ・Voice favorite registration ・Onomatopoeia display / non-display switching of H scene
